thread.title: BRIEF-Arotech's Power Systems Division Selected To Provide Canadian Armed Forces With Battery Charging Solution

title: BRIEF-Arotech's Power Systems Division Selected To Provide Canadian Armed Forces With Battery Charging Solution

organizations.name: power systems division selected to provide canadian armed forces with battery charging solution

text:
May 3, 2018 / 1:09 PM / in 7 minutes BRIEF-Arotech's Power Systems Division Selected To Provide Canadian Armed Forces With Battery Charging Solution Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
May 3 (Reuters) - Arotech Corp:
* AROTECHâ€™S POWER SYSTEMS DIVISION SELECTED TO PROVIDE CANADIAN ARMED FORCES WITH BATTERY CHARGING SOLUTION FOR INTEGRATED SOLDIER SYSTEM PROGRAM
* EPSILOR-ELECTRIC FUEL LTD - WON TENDER FROM CANADIAN DND WORTH ABOUT $3 MILLION IN INITIAL PHASE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
